description.en-US: archive-binlog record all changes made to the database and are crucial for replication and point-in-time recovery.

xtraBackup is an open-source tool for hot backups of MySQL databases, allowing data to be backed up without locking tables. It supports incremental backups and compression, making the backup process efficient and non-disruptive to ongoing operations.
ApeCloud MySQL is a database that is compatible with MySQL syntax and achieves high availability through the utilization of the RAFT consensus protocol.
description.zh-CN: ApeCloud MySQL 是一个兼容MySQL语法的数据库，通过利用 RAFT 一致性协议来实现高可用性。

description.en-US: Cluster with only a primary node, typically used for testing, development, or small-scale applications.
description.zh-CN: 仅有主节点的集群，通常用于测试、开发或小规模应用。

description.en-US: A strong consistent high-availability cluster with one leader and two followers to ensure that RPO=0 in the case of a single availability zone failure.
description.zh-CN: 强一致性高可用性集群，包括一个主节点和两个从节点，以确保在单个可用性区域故障的情况下 RPO（恢复点目标）为0。

defaultTplDescription.en-US: Default parameter template for ApeCloud MySQL 8.0
Default parameter template for ApeCloud MySQL vtgate
defaultTplDescription.zh-CN: ApeCloud MySQL vtgate的默认参数模板

description.en-US: ClickHouse is a columnar storage database (DBMS) developed by Yandex in Russia in 2016 for the Online Analytical Processing (OLAP) MPP architecture, which can generate real-time analysis data reports using SQL queries. The full name of ClickHouse is Click Stream, Data WareHouse.
description.zh-CN: ClickHouse 是俄罗斯的 Yandex 于 2016 年开源的用于在线分析处理查询（OLAP :Online Analytical Processing）MPP架构的列式存储数据库（DBMS：Database Management System），能够使用 SQL 查询实时生成分析数据报告。ClickHouse的全称是Click Stream，Data WareHouse。

description.en-US: Cluster with single clickhouse instance, typically used for testing, development, or small-scale application.
description.zh-CN: 仅有单个clickhouse实例的集群，通常用于测试、开发或小规模应用。

description.en-US: Distribute data across multiple nodes for parallel processing, achieving horizontal scalability and high-performance analysis and querying of large-scale datasets.
description.zh-CN: 将数据分布在多个节点上并行处理，实现水平扩展和大规模数据集的高性能分析与查询。

description.en-US: The Dameng Database Management System (DMDBMS) is a high-performance database management system developed by Dm Company with full intellectual property rights.
description.zh-CN: 达梦数据库是达梦公司推出的具有完全自主知识产权的高性能数据库管理系统.

description.en-US: The real-time active-standby system consists of a primary database, a real-time standby database, a watchdog process, and a monitor. By deploying the real-time active-standby system, various hardware failures and abnormal database instances can be promptly detected and addressed, ensuring continuous provision of database services.
description.zh-CN: 实时主备系统由主库、实时备库、守护进程和监视器组成。通过部署实时主备系统，可以及时检测并处理各种硬件故障、数据库实例异常，确保持续提供数据库服务。

description.en-US: If ORACLE compatibility is required, it is recommended to configure it as Yes.
description.zh-CN: 如果需要兼容ORACLE，推荐配置为Yes

description.en-US: If ORACLE compatibility is required, it is recommended to configure it as Yes.
description.zh-CN: 如果需要兼容ORACLE，推荐配置为Yes

description.en-US: When you need to use the client's read/write separation functionality outside the k8s cluster, please enable host networking.
description.zh-CN: 当需要在k8s集群外使用客户端的读写分离功能时，请开启主机网络

description.en-US: GaussDB is a distributed relational database independently innovated and developed by Huawei. It provides enterprises with comprehensive, stable, reliable, highly scalable, and superior performance enterprise-level database services.
description.zh-CN: GaussDB 是华为公司自主创新开发的分布式关系数据库。为企业提供全面、稳定、可靠、高度可扩展、性能优越的企业级数据库服务。

description.en-US: Cluster with only a primary node, typically used for testing, development, or small-scale applications.
description.zh-CN: 仅有主节点的集群，通常用于测试、开发或小规模应用。

description.en-US: A cluster with one primary node and one backup node. If the primary node fails, the backup node will automatically upgrade to the primary node to ensure service continuity.
description.zh-CN: 具有一个主节点和一个备节点的集群。如果主节点故障，备节点会自动升级为主节点，以确保服务的连续性。

description.en-US: Apache Kafka is a distributed streaming platform designed to build real-time pipelines and can be used as a message broker or as a replacement for a log aggregation solution for big data applications.
description.zh-CN: Apache Kafka 是一个分布式流处理平台，旨在构建实时数据管道，可以用作消息代理，也可以作为大数据应用的日志聚合解决方案的替代品。

description.en-US: A deployment pattern where nodes can simultaneously act as both Broker and Controller roles.
description.zh-CN: 节点可以同时充当Broker和Controller角色的部署模式

description.en-US: The deployment mode where nodes can only play one of the roles of Broker and Controller.
description.zh-CN: 节点只能扮演Broker和Controller其中一个角色的部署模式

description.en-US: The deployment mode where Kafka utilizes ZooKeeper for managing cluster metadata and coordinating tasks, with the Controller role typically held by a single node elected by ZooKeeper.
description.zh-CN: 使用 ZooKeeper 来管理集群元数据和协调任务，Controller 角色通常由 ZooKeeper 选举出的单个节点负责

description.en-US: KingbaseDB is an enterprise distribution customized by Kingbase based on the postgresql open source database. It focuses on high availability, security, automated operation and maintenance, database all-in-one machine and SQL audit optimization and other enterprise needs meet the needs of enterprise users.
description.zh-CN: KingbaseDB 是金仓基于postgresql开源数据库进行定制、推出的企业发行版。它将围绕高可用、安全、自动化运维、数据库一体机和SQL审核优化等企业需求，解决企业用户落地。

description.en-US: A cluster with one primary node and one standby node. If the primary node fails, the standby node will automatically upgrade to the primary node to ensure service continuity.
description.zh-CN: 具有一个主节点和一个备节点的集群。如果主节点故障，备节点会自动升级为主节点，以确保服务的连续性。

description.en-US: Loki Cluster
description.zh-CN: Loki集群

description.en-US: Default mode for Loki Cluster
description.zh-CN: Loki集群默认模式

description.en-US: MinIO is an object storage system, compatible with the Amazon S3 API, for storing large-scale unstructured data.
description.zh-CN: MinIO 是一个对象存储系统，兼容 Amazon S3 API，适用于存储大规模非结构化数据

description.en-US: A cluster with multiple nodes, lets you pool multiple drives into a single object storage server
description.zh-CN: 具有多个节点的集群，可将多个硬盘汇集到一个对象存储服务中

description.en-US: Qdrant is an open source (Apache-2.0 licensed), vector similarity search engine and vector database.
description.zh-CN: Qdrant 是一个开源的（使用 Apache-2.0 许可证），用于向量相似性搜索和向量数据库的引擎。

description.en-US: Cluster with only a primary node, typically used for testing, development, or small-scale applications.
description.zh-CN: 仅有主节点的集群，通常用于测试、开发或小规模应用。

description.en-US: Cluster with one primary node and the rest as secondary node. If the primary node fails, a secondary node is automatically promoted to ensure service continuity.
description.zh-CN: 具有一个主节点和其余为备节点的集群。如果主节点故障，将自动提升一个备节点为主节点，以确保服务的连续性。

description.en-US: archive-binlog record all changes made to the database and are crucial for replication and point-in-time recovery.

xtraBackup is an open-source tool for hot backups of MySQL databases, allowing data to be backed up without locking tables. It supports incremental backups and compression, making the backup process efficient and non-disruptive to ongoing operations.
MySQL is a relational database management system developed by MySQL AB in Sweden and is a product under Oracle.
description.zh-CN: MySQL 是一个关系型数据库管理系统，由瑞典MySQL AB 公司开发，属于 Oracle旗下产品。

description.en-US: Cluster with only a primary node, typically used for testing, development, or small-scale applications.
description.zh-CN: 仅有主节点的集群，通常用于测试、开发或小规模应用。

description.en-US: A cluster with one primary node and one backup node. If the primary node fails, the backup node will automatically upgrade to the primary node to ensure service continuity.
description.zh-CN: 具有一个主节点和一个备节点的集群。如果主节点故障，备节点会自动升级为主节点，以确保服务的连续性。

calculationParams.description: 'innodb_buffer_pool_size' is determined by the variable '$buffer_pool_size', which is calculated based on factors such as the container's memory, CPU count, and whether it is shared. You cannot directly change the value of '$buffer_pool_size', but you can multiply it by a coefficient to adjust the value of 'innodb_buffer_pool_size' as needed.
calculationParams.name: innodb_buffer_pool_size

calculationParams.description: 'max_connections' is calculated by '$phy_memory' and '$single_thread_memory', where '$phy_memory' represents the physical memory of the container, and '$single_thread_memory' represents the memory occupied by a single thread.
calculationParams.name: max_connections

calculationParams.description: 'innodb_buffer_pool_size' is determined by the variable '$buffer_pool_size', which is calculated based on factors such as the container's memory, CPU count, and whether it is shared. You cannot directly change the value of '$buffer_pool_size', but you can multiply it by a coefficient to adjust the value of 'innodb_buffer_pool_size' as needed.
calculationParams.name: innodb_buffer_pool_size

calculationParams.description: 'max_connections' is calculated by '$phy_memory' and '$single_thread_memory', where '$phy_memory' represents the physical memory of the container, and '$single_thread_memory' represents the memory occupied by a single thread.
calculationParams.name: max_connections

calculationParams.description: 'innodb_buffer_pool_size' is determined by the variable '$buffer_pool_size', which is calculated based on factors such as the container's memory, CPU count, and whether it is shared. You cannot directly change the value of '$buffer_pool_size', but you can multiply it by a coefficient to adjust the value of 'innodb_buffer_pool_size' as needed.
calculationParams.name: innodb_buffer_pool_size

calculationParams.description: 'max_connections' is calculated by '$phy_memory' and '$single_thread_memory', where '$phy_memory' represents the physical memory of the container, and '$single_thread_memory' represents the memory occupied by a single thread.
calculationParams.name: max_connections

description.en-US: OceanBase is an enterprise-grade open source distributed SQL database. It supports transparent scalability, distributed transaction, multi-tenancy, and is highly compatible with MySQL
description.zh-CN: 兼容 MySQL 的单机分布式一体化国产开源数据库，具有原生分布式架构，支持金融级高可用、透明水平扩展、分布式事务、多租户和语法兼容等企业级特性

description.en-US: A replication cluster, where the primary-standby relationship exists at the tenant level, establishes a transmission channel thereof through network direct connection or third-party log services, and only transmits logs.
description.zh-CN: 主备集群, 主备关系存在于租户级别.主备之间通过网络直连或第三方日志服务建立传输渠道，只传输日志.

description.en-US: Oracle database is a powerful and secure relational database management system widely used in enterprise level applications and large-scale data processing scenarios.
description.zh-CN: Oracle数据库是一个功能强大且安全可靠的关系型数据库管理系统，被广泛应用于企业级应用和大规模数据处理场景。

description.en-US: Cluster with only a primary node, typically used for testing, development, or small-scale applications.
description.zh-CN: 仅有主节点的集群，通常用于测试、开发或小规模应用。

description.en-US: archive-binlog record all changes made to the database and are crucial for replication and point-in-time recovery.
PostgreSQL (Postgres) is an open source object-relational database known for reliability and data integrity. ACID-compliant, it supports foreign keys, joins, views, triggers and stored procedures.
description.zh-CN: PostgreSQL（也称为 Postgres）是一个开源的面向对象的关系数据库，以其可靠性和数据完整性而闻名。它符合 ACID 规范，支持外键、联接、视图、触发器和存储过程等功能。

description.en-US: Cluster with only a primary node, typically used for testing, development, or small-scale applications.
description.zh-CN: 仅有主节点的集群，通常用于测试、开发或小规模应用。

description.en-US: A cluster with one primary node and one backup node. If the primary node fails, the backup node will automatically upgrade to the primary node to ensure service continuity.
description.zh-CN: 具有一个主节点和一个备节点的集群。如果主节点故障，备节点会自动升级为主节点，以确保服务的连续性。

description.en-US: Apache® Pulsar™ is an open-source, distributed messaging and streaming platform built for the cloud.
description.zh-CN: Apache®Pulsar™是一个为云构建的开源、分布式消息传递和流媒体平台。

description.en-US: Cluster with one primary node and the rest as secondary node. If the primary node fails, a secondary node is automatically promoted to ensure service continuity.
description.zh-CN: 包括一个主节点和多个副本节点。主节点负责处理所有写操作，并将写操作的结果复制到副本节点上，从而实现数据冗余和高可用性。

description.en-US: Redis is an in-memory data structure store, used as a database, cache and message broker.
description.zh-CN: Redis 是一个内存数据结构存储，用作数据库、缓存和消息代理。

description.en-US: Cluster with only a primary node, typically used for testing, development, or small-scale applications.
description.zh-CN: 仅有主节点的集群，通常用于测试、开发或小规模应用。

description.en-US: A cluster with one primary node and one backup node. If the primary node fails, the backup node will automatically upgrade to the primary node to ensure service continuity.
description.zh-CN: 具有一个主节点和一个备节点的集群。如果主节点故障，备节点会自动升级为主节点，以确保服务的连续性。

description.en-US: A cluster with one primary node and multiple secondary nodes, implemented by Sentinel instances to achieve automatic failover, update client configuration information, and ensure that clients can automatically connect to the new primary node. Through Sentinel, you can also obtain the address information of the secondary node to achieve read-write separation and improve system read performance.
description.zh-CN: 具有一个主节点和多个从节点的集群，由哨兵(Sentinel)实例实现自动故障转移，同时更新客户端配置信息，确保客户端能自动连接到新的主节点。通过哨兵也可获取从节点地址信息，实现读写分离，提升系统读性能。

description.en-US: StarRocks is a next-gen, high-performance analytical data warehouse that enables real-time, multi-dimensional, and highly concurrent data analysis.
description.zh-CN: StarRocks是一款高性能分析型数据仓库，使用向量化、MPP 架构、CBO、智能物化视图、可实时更新的列式存储引擎等技术实现多维、实时、高并发的数据分析

defaultTplDescription.en-US: Default parameter template for starrocks 3.0 frontend shared data
defaultTplDescription.zh-CN: starrocks 3.0 frontend shared data的默认参数模板

defaultTplDescription.zh-CN: starrocks 3.0 frontend shared nothing的默认参数模板

Default parameter template for starrocks 3.0 cn

description.en-US: TiDB is an open-source distributed SQL database that supports Hybrid Transactional and Analytical Processing (HTAP) workloads. It is MySQL compatible and features horizontal scalability, strong consistency, and high availability.
description.zh-CN: TiDB 是一款开源分布式关系型数据库，同时支持在线事务处理与在线分析处理 (Hybrid Transactional and Analytical Processing, HTAP)，具备水平扩容或者缩容、金融级高可用、实时 HTAP、云原生的分布式数据库、兼容 MySQL 协议和 MySQL 生态等重要特性。

description.en-US: Suitable for large-scale production environments
description.zh-CN: 适用于大规模的生产环境

description.en-US: Victoria Metrics
description.zh-CN: Victoria Metrics

description.zh-CN: Victoria Metrics 集群默认模式

description.en-US: Elasticsearch is an open source distributed search and analytics engine that stores, retrieves and analyzes data in an efficient and powerful way.
description.zh-CN: Elasticsearch是一个开源的分布式搜索和分析引擎，它以高效、强大的方式存储、检索和分析数据。

description.en-US: MogDB is an enterprise distribution customized by Yunhe Enmo based on the openGauss open source database. It will focus on high availability, security, automated operation and maintenance, database all-in-one machine and SQL audit optimization and other enterprise needs to solve the landing of enterprise users.
description.zh-CN: MogDB 是云和恩墨基于 OpenGauss 开源数据库进行定制、推出的企业发行版。它将围绕高可用、安全、自动化运维、数据库一体机和SQL审核优化等企业需求，解决企业用户落地。

description.en-US: A cluster with one primary node and one backup node. If the primary node fails, the backup node will automatically upgrade to the primary node to ensure service continuity.
description.zh-CN: 具有一个主节点和一个备节点的集群。如果主节点故障，备节点会自动升级为主节点，以确保服务的连续性。

description.en-US: a special capped collection that keeps a rolling record of all operations that modify the data stored in your databases.
a utility that creates a binary export of a database's contents.
MongoDB is a document database designed for ease of application development and scaling.
description.zh-CN: MongoDB 是一个为了简化应用程序开发和扩展而设计的文档数据库。

description.en-US: Cluster with only a primary node, typically used for testing, development, or small-scale applications.
description.zh-CN: 仅有主节点的集群，通常用于测试、开发或小规模应用。

description.en-US: Cluster with one primary node and the rest as secondary node. If the primary node fails, a secondary node is automatically promoted to ensure service continuity.
description.zh-CN: 包括一个主节点和多个副本节点。主节点负责处理所有写操作，并将写操作的结果复制到副本节点上，从而实现数据冗余和高可用性。

description.en-US: PolarDB-X is a cloud native distributed SQL Database designed for high concurrency, massive storages and complex querying scenarios. It supports horizontal scaling, distributed transactions and Hybrid Transactional and Analytical Processing (HTAP) workloads, and is characterized by enterprise-class, cloud native, high availability, highly compatible with MySQL and its ecosystem.
description.zh-CN: PolarDB-X是一个云原生分布式SQL数据库，专为高并发、海量存储和复杂查询场景而设计。它支持横向扩展、分布式事务和混合事务与分析处理（HTAP）工作负载，具有企业级、云原生、高可用性、与MySQL及其生态系统高度兼容的特点。

description.en-US: Suitable for large-scale production environments
description.zh-CN: 适用于大规模的生产环境。

description.en-US: RabbitMQ is a reliable and mature messaging and streaming broker.
description.zh-CN: RabbitMQ是一款可靠且成熟的消息和流媒体中间件服务。

description.en-US: Cluster with only a primary node, typically used for testing, development, or small-scale applications. not for production.
description.zh-CN: 仅有主节点的集群，通常用于测试、开发或小规模应用。

description.en-US: A cluster with one primary node and one backup node. If the primary node fails, the backup node will automatically upgrade to the primary node to ensure service continuity.
description.zh-CN: 具有一个主节点和一个备节点的集群。如果主节点故障，备节点会自动升级为主节点，以确保服务的连续性。

description.en-US: archive-wal records write-ahead-log to support point-in-time recovery.
Vastbase is an enterprise-level relational database based on the open-source openGauss kernel, designed for handling massive amounts of data.
description.zh-CN: Vastbase 数据库是海量数据基于开源 openGauss 内核开发的企业级关系型数据库。

description.en-US: A cluster with one primary node and one backup node. If the primary node fails, the backup node will automatically upgrade to the primary node to ensure service continuity.
description.zh-CN: 具有一个主节点和一个备节点的集群。如果主节点故障，备节点会自动升级为主节点，以确保服务的连续性。

description.en-US: ZooKeeper is a centralized service for maintaining configuration information, naming, providing distributed synchronization, and providing group services.
description.zh-CN: ZooKeeper 一个开源的分布式协调服务, 用于维护配置信息, 命名服务, 提供分布式同步和集群服务。

description.en-US: Cluster with only a primary node, typically used for testing, development, or small-scale applications.
description.zh-CN: 仅有主节点的集群，通常用于测试、开发或小规模应用。

description.en-US: A cluster with one leader node and two learner nodes. If the leader node fails, the learner node will automatically upgrade to the leader node to ensure service continuity.
description.zh-CN: 具有一个主节点和两个从节点的高可用集群。如果主节点故障，从节点会自动升级为主节点，以确保服务的连续性。
